Description:
List credentials currently stored in Windows Credential Manager via the native Windows utility vaultcmd.exe

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Windows Credential Manager Access via VaultCmd
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%/listcreds:%' and (process_path like '%\vaultcmd.exe' and original_file_name = 'vaultcmd.exe'))
